Masoquestors Blacksmithing

Blacksmithing is probably the hardest trade skill to learn, but it is most profitable when all is said and done. In beginning blacksmithing expect to invest upwards of 175+ platinum to become an expert (skill of 85 +). Then once your gain the rare and respected title of master blacksmith, you will undoubtedly make your investment back as well as acquiring a plentiful wealth stemming from your new career.

Conversion rates: Two pieces of Small ore = Metal Bits Three pieces of Small bricks of ore = Large Brick of ore Three large bricks or ore = Block of ore You will need a flask of water to cool the ore."

here is the list of stuff to make untill they are trivial..then move on down the list *smile*

Sharpening weapons: 1 sharpening stone, one rusty weapon (not hammers or spears)

Metal bits: 2 small ore (unstacked) one water

Files: one file mold, one metal bit and one flask of water

Studs: (not the male kind either *L*)one file, one flask water, 3 metal bits(make sure your skill is at lvl 25-30 before attempting this)

Tool Box: one metal bits one flask water

Steel boning: one water, small brick of ore and file

Smoker:Metal Bits Skewers,Smoker Base Mold ,Smoker Support Mold , Smoker Support Mold

Skewers: metal bits,skewer mold, flask of water

Sheet of Metal: two small bricks of ore,water (not stacked ore)

Shaped cookie cutters: appropriate shaped cookie cutter mold,flask of water,metal bits

Sewing Kit: metal bits,needle mold,thimble mold, flask of water

Scaler: metal bits, flask of water, scaler mold

Pot: metal bits, pot mold, standing leg mold, flask of water

Pie Tin: Metal bits, pot tin mold, ceramic lining, flask of water

Muffin Tin: metal bits, muffin tin mold,ceramic lining, flask of water

Metal container: metal bits, Hinge Mold, Container base and lid mold,flask of water

Lock Picks: metal bits, lock pick mold, flask of water

Lantern: metal bits, Lantern casing mold, bottle, flask of water

Folded sheet of Metal: block of ore, flask of water

File: metal bits, file mold, flask of water

Cake Round: metal bits, cake round mold, ceramic lining, flask of water

Advanced Blacksmithing

skill lvl: 50+ items needed to make: 1 sheet of metal, gorget mold, flask of water

skill lvl: 55+ items needed to make: 1 sheet of metal, bracer mold, flask of water

(no stats available yet) skill lvl: 55+ items needed to make: 1 sheet of metal, one boot mold, one flask of water

(no stats available yet) skill lvl: 60+ items needed to make: 2 sheets of metal, mask mold, one flask of water

(no stats available yet) skill lvl: 60+ items needed to make: 2 sheets of metal, sleeves mold, flask of water

skill lvl: 60+ items needed to make: 2 sheets of metal, helm mold, one flask water

skill lvl: 80+ items needed to make: 2 sheets of metal, mantle mold, flask of water

(no available stats yet) skill lvl: 80+ items needed to make: 2 sheets of metal, belt mold, flask of water

(no availabe stats yet) skill lvl: 100+ items needed to make: 2 sheets of metal, cloak mold, flask of water

skill lvl: 100+ items needed to make: 3 sheets of metal, legs mold, flask of water

skill lvl: 100+ items needed to make: 3 sheets of metal, mail mold, flask of water


Good luck and may you all get rich in this skill!!
